headline: Show HN: Datagridxl2.js – Fast Excel-like data table library
description:
I'm Robbert, the creator of DataGridXL.js. Last month I released version 2 which includes many new features.

DataGridXL is a free (and commercial) editable data table library written in ES6.

My goal is to develop the most performant & user-friendly spreadsheet-like data table out there:

- It has zero dependencies. You don’t need any framework to use DataGridXL. - It is lightweight (~250kb) and easy to use. It does not even require messing with CSS. - It has its own Virtual DOM implementation to prevent DOM errors. - Developer friendly. Supports all modern web browsers

Please take a look at the performance demo (https://www.datagridxl.com/demos/one-million-cells) to see the difference with other data grids out there. And let us know if you have any suggestions.

Please let me know if you have any suggestions or comments!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Datagridxl2.js - 快速类似Excel的数据表库
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Datagridxl2.js - 快速類似Excel的數據表庫
description_zh-Hans:
我是Robbert，DataGridXL.js的创造者。上个月我发布了第二版，其中包括许多新功能。

DataGridXL是一个用ES6编写的免费（和商业）可编辑的数据表库。

我的目标是开发出性能最强&；用户友好的类似电子表格的数据表：

- 它有零依赖性。你不需要任何框架来使用DataGridXL。 - 它是轻量级的（约250kb），易于使用。It does not even require messing with CSS. - It has its own Virtual DOM implementation to prevent DOM errors. - Developer friendly. Supports all modern web browsers

Please take a look at the performance demo (https://www.datagridxl.com/demos/one-million-cells) to see the difference with other data grids out there. 如果您有任何建议，请让我们知道。

如果您有任何建议或意见，请让我知道!
description_zh-Hant:
我是Robbert，DataGridXL.js的創造者。上個月我發佈了第二版，其中包括許多新功能。

DataGridXL是一個用ES6編寫的免費（和商業）可編輯的數據表庫。

我的目標是開發出性能最強&；用戶友好的類似電子表格的數據表：

- 它有零依賴性。你不需要任何框架來使用DataGridXL。 - 它是輕量級的（約250kb），易於使用。It does not even require messing with CSS. - It has its own Virtual DOM implementation to prevent DOM errors. - Developer friendly. Supports all modern web browsers

Please take a look at the performance demo (https://www.datagridxl.com/demos/one-million-cells) to see the difference with other data grids out there. 如果您有任何建議，請讓我們知道。

如果您有任何建議或意見，請讓我知道!
